snippet.title: Tunnel Terror short play (Apple II - Adventure International)
snippet.description:
Tunnel Terror (https://www.mobygames.com/game/tunnel-terror) was an action game published by Adventure International in 1982 for the Apple ][. It's similar to Atari's Tempest and EA's Axis Assassin (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=THXxHJpTsBw). Hope you enjoy the short play!

PS: The # if lives is stored at address $81 and you can get infinite lives by changing $E3A from C6 to A5.

Credits:
Cover art: giantbomb.com
Total Replay: 4AM
